title: Tyson Foods Inc. Recalls Chicken Product Due To Possible Adulteration
summary: WASHINGTON, Nov. 17, 2015 Tyson Foods Inc., a Pine Bluff, Ark. establishment, is recalling approximately 52,486 pounds of chicken wing product that may be adulterated because of having an off odor scent, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today.The...
